SDG_GOAL: Goal 11: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
SDG_TARGET: Target 11.3: By 2030, enhance inclusive and sustainable urbanization and capacity for participatory, integrated and sustainable human settlement planning and management in all countries
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 11.3.1: Ratio of land consumption rate to population growth rate
STAT_CONC_DEF: The indicator is defined as the ratio of land consumption rate to population growth rate.
REC_USE_LIM:
This study combines data from the 1971, 1991, 2001 and 2011 Census of Population with special data sets providing information on land cover and land use, in order to analyze the evoluation of built-up areas around Census metropolitan areas (CMAs).

2011 CMA boundaries are used for all years. Total area excludes water.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 11: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 11.3: By 2030, enhance inclusive and sustainable urbanization and capacity for participatory, integrated and sustainable human settlement planning and management in all countries
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 11.3.1: Ratio of land consumption rate to population growth rate

fr.SDG_GOAL: Objectif 11 : Faire en sorte que les villes et les établissements humains soient ouverts à tous, sûrs, résilients et durables
fr.SDG_TARGET: Cible 11.3 : D’ici à 2030, renforcer l’urbanisation durable pour tous et les capacités de planification et de gestion participatives, intégrées et durables des établissements humains dans tous les pays
fr.SDG_INDICATOR: Indicateur 11.3.1 : Ratio entre le taux d’utilisation des terres et le taux de croissance démographique »
fr.STAT_CONC_DEF: L'indicateur est défini comme le rapport entre le taux de consommation des terres et le taux de croissance démographique.
